name: Music_2617.wav
caption: This is a French opera/opera-ballet music piece. There is no singer in this piece. The only instrument that is being played is a harpsichord. The sound and the tunes are reminiscent of the medieval era. There is a theatrical feel to the piece. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a historical drama that takes place in the medieval era. It could also be used as an accompaniment piece for a theater play or a ballet dance performance.
